Bulwark.name: Extra Protection

ARProficiency.name: Rifleman

FragProficiency.name: Bombs Away
FragProficiency.base_description:
For every skill equipped in the Grenadier branch, Frag Grenades deal {IncreasedDamage} more damage.
{ComputedIncreasedDamage}
FragProficiency.aced_description:
The blast radius of Frag Grenades increases by  {AcedIncreasedRange} meters for every skill equipped in the Grenadier branch.
{ComputedAcedIncreasedRange}

DodgeMaster.name: Dodge This

SMGProficiency.name: SMG Adept
SMGProficiency.base_description:
For every skill equipped in the Special Ops branch, SMGs deal {IncreasedDamage} additional damage to enemy armor.
{ComputedIncreasedDamage}
SMGProficiency.aced_description:
For every skill equipped in the Special Ops branch, SMG spread reduces by {AcedIncreasedAccuracy}.
{ComputedAcedIncreasedAccuracy}

SmokeProficiency.name: Heavy Smoker
SmokeProficiency.base_description:
For every skill equipped in the Fog Machine branch, the range of Smoke Grenades increases by {IncreasedRange}.
{ComputedIncreasedRange}
SmokeProficiency.aced_description:
The duration of Smoke Grenades increases by {AcedIncreasedDuration} for every skill equipped in the Fog Machine branch.
{ComputedAcedIncreasedDuration}

DroneOperator.name: Sentry Operator
DroneOperator.aced_description:
The Sentry Turret's Armor Penetration raises by {AcedIncreasedArmorPenetration} for every skill equipped in the Engineer branch.
{ComputedAcedIncreasedArmorPenetration}

ShotgunExpert.name: Calling Shotgun
ShotgunExpert.base_description:
For every skill equipped in the Shotgunner branch, Shotgun pellets receive a {DecreasedDamageFalloff} reduction to damage falloff.
{ComputedDecreasedDamageFalloff}
ShotgunExpert.aced_description:
For every skill equipped in the Shotgunner branch, the spread of Shotgun pellets reduces by {AcedIncreasedAccuracy} while in ADS.
{ComputedAcedIncreasedAccuracy}

Electrician.name: Shock Factor
Electrician.base_description:
For every skill equipped in the Electrician branch, the blast radius of Shock Grenades increases by {IncreasedRange}.
{ComputedIncreasedRange}
Electrician.aced_description:
For every skill equipped in the Electrician branch, the electricity from Shock Grenades bounces {AcedBounces} additional time.
{ComputedAcedBounces}

HackingExpert.name: Security Expert
HackingExpert.aced_description:
Hack drones for <Skill>1</> Runtime. Once a hack wears off, the Runtime you spent will be refunded.

Stealth drones stop moving and go blind for {AcedDroneHackDuration} seconds. Combat drones fight on your side for {AcedDroneHackDuration} seconds, then self-destruct.

PistolExpert.name: Bullseye
PistolExpert.aced_description:
For every skill equipped in the Hitman branch, Handguns receive an accuracy bonus of {AcedIncreasedAccuracy}.
{ComputedAcedIncreasedAccuracy}

FlashbangExpert.name: Shine On
FlashbangExpert.base_description:
For every skill equipped in the Flashpoint branch, the stun duration of Flashbang Grenades increases by {IncreasedStunnedDuration}.
{ComputedIncreasedStunnedDuration}
FlashbangExpert.aced_description:
The range of Flashbang Grenades increases by {AcedIncreasedRange} for every skill equipped in the Flashpoint branch.
{ComputedAcedIncreasedRange}

UnmaskedExpert.name: Adrenaline Junkie
UnmaskedExpert.base_description:
For every skill equipped in the Imposter branch, all Adrenaline you gain increases by {IncreasedOverHeal}.
{ComputedIncreasedOverHeal}
UnmaskedExpert.aced_description: If you have no Adrenaline while at full health, walking unmasked within {AcedWithinRange} meter of a civilian will give you {AcedAdditionalOverHeal} Adrenaline.

MedicExpert.name: Doctor's Orders
MedicExpert.base_description:
For every skill equipped in the Pill Pusher branch, revive crewmates {IncreasedReviveSpeed} faster.
{ComputedIncreasedReviveSpeed}
MedicExpert.aced_description:
Immediately after you revive a crewmate, both of you are immune to damage for a finite period: {AcedImmuneDuration} seconds for every skill equipped in the Pill Pusher branch.
{ComputedAcedImmuneDuration}

KnifeExpert.name: Knife Expert
KnifeExpert.base_description:
If your starting loadout contains Throwing Knives, receive {AdditionalKnifes} additional knife for every skill equipped in the Cutthroat branch.
{ComputedAdditionalKnifes}
KnifeExpert.aced_description:
For every skill equipped in the Cutthroat branch, Throwing Knives will penetrate {EnemyPenetrationCount} enemy and hit whatever is behind them.
{ComputedEnemyPenetrationCount}

TradingExpert.name: Trade Broker
TradingExpert.aced_description:
For every skill equipped in the Puppet Master branch, tie and trade hostages {AcedIncreasedInteractionSpeed} faster.
{ComputedAcedIncreasedInteractionSpeed}

SniperExpert.name: Head Games
SniperExpert.base_description:
For every skill equipped in the Longshot branch, your headshot multiplier with Marksman rifles increases by {AdditionalHeadshotMultiplier}.
{ComputedAdditionalHeadshotMultiplier}

AmmoExpert.name: Munitions Expert
AmmoExpert.base_description:
For every skill equipped in the Ammo Specialist branch, your Ammo Bags restore {IncreasedAmmo} additional ammo to all heisters.
{ComputedIncreasedAmmo}

LockedIn.name: Head Guard
LockedIn.base_description: Headshot kills reduce Armor Regeneration time by {RegenReductionTime} seconds.
LockedIn.aced_description: Headshot kills now reduce Armor Regeneration time by {AcedRegenReductionTime} seconds.

FocusFire.name: Focus Fire
FocusFire.base_description:
Each hit with an Assault Rifle or LMG boosts your accuracy by {IncreasedAccuracy}, while each miss decreases it by {DecreasedAccuracy}.

This accuracy modifier resets when you reload or swap weapons.
FocusFire.aced_description:
Each hit with an Assault Rifle or LMG also boosts your stability by {AcedIncreasedStability}, while each miss decreases it by {AcedDecreasedStability}.

This stability modifier resets when you reload or swap weapons.

Tenderize.name: Burn Damage
Tenderize.base_description: Enemies injured by your Frag Grenades suffer an additional {IncreasedDamage} damage from all sources.
Tenderize.aced_description: Raise your Frag Grenade damage bonus to {AcedIncreasedDamage}.

JudoChop.name: Judo Chop
JudoChop.base_description: Quick melee an unalerted guard to kill them instantly.
JudoChop.aced_description: Guards must examine your Judo Chop victims closely before they realize a murder has taken place.

NimbleHands.name: Multitasker
NimbleHands.base_description: When you break an enemy's armor layer with an SMG, that enemy becomes heavily staggered.
NimbleHands.aced_description:
Perform a quick melee on an enemy while wielding an SMG to reload it instantly.

This skill has a cooldown of {AcedSkillCooldown} seconds.

CoughingFit.name: Brain Fog
CoughingFit.base_description:
Enemies affected by your Smoke Grenade deal {DecreasedOutgoingDamage} less damage while caught in its cloud.

This effect will continue for {DecreasedOutgoingDamageDuration} seconds after they escape the smoke.
CoughingFit.aced_description:
This damage penalty increases to {AcedDecreasedOutgoingDamage}.

Smoke Grenades now mark affected enemies, as well as civilians.

TurretReinforcement.name: Artificial Ally
TurretReinforcement.base_description:
Heisters receive {AmmoMultiplier} of an ammo pickup for every second they stand within {WithinRange} meters of your Sentry Turret.

There is a {PickupThrowableChance} chance that this pickup will restore a throwable.
TurretReinforcement.aced_description: Sentry Turrets can now rotate a full <Skill>360</> degrees.

PointBlank.name: Point Blank
PointBlank.base_description: Shotguns deal {IncreasedDamage} additional damage to enemies within {WithinRange} meters.
PointBlank.aced_description: Raise your Shotgun's close-range damage bonus to {AcedIncreasedDamage}.

ElectricStunner.name: Stunned
ElectricStunner.base_description: The stun duration from Shock Grenades increases by {IncreasedDuration}.
ElectricStunner.aced_description: Raise the duration of Shock Grenade stuns by {AcedIncreasedDuration}.

HackLooper.name: Playback
HackLooper.base_description:
Spend <Skill>1</> Runtime to make a hacked security camera loop its footage. Looping cameras cannot detect your crew.

If a hacked camera is destroyed, the Runtime you spent will be refunded.
HackLooper.aced_description:
Spend <Skill>1</> Runtime to make a hacked camera automatically mark all guards or law enforcement within range.

Targets stay marked for <Skill>12</> seconds after leaving the camera's field of view.

PistolPrecision.name: Quick Draw
PistolPrecision.base_description: While swapping to and from a Handgun, your weapon swap speed increases by {IncreasedEquipSpeed}. Your ADS speed with Handguns increases by {IncreasedADSSpeed}.
PistolPrecision.aced_description: Your weapon swapping and ADS bonuses with Handguns increase to {AcedIncreasedEquipSpeed}.

RiotControl.name: Flash Mob
RiotControl.base_description: Flashbang Grenades are silent, making them undetectable to anyone outside the flash radius.
RiotControl.aced_description: Civilians caught by your Flashbang Grenade cannot flee or receive help from Hostage Rescue for {AcedAffectedDuration} seconds.

Focused.name: Thrill Seeker
Focused.base_description: While you are unmasked, your Adrenaline no longer decreases.
Focused.aced_description: If you are unmasked and have Adrenaline, you will move faster.

DoctoredUpI.name: Field Medic I
DoctoredUpI.base_description: Your Medic Bag comes with {AdditionalCharges} additional charge.

Laceration.name: Laceration
Laceration.base_description:
Throwing Knives cause Bleeding on targets. This does not apply to Dozers.

Over a duration of {BleedDuration} seconds, Bleeding enemies will suffer twice the damage of a Throwing Knife hit directly to their health.
Laceration.aced_description: The time it takes for an enemy to suffer their full Bleeding damage shortens to {AcedBleedDuration} seconds.

GroupieMagnet.name: Magnetic Charm
GroupieMagnet.base_description: Every guard, employee or law enforcement you trade counts as <Skill>1</> additional hostage.
GroupieMagnet.aced_description: Command up to {AcedMaxAllowedFollowers} hostages to follow you at once.

SniperPockets.name: Stockpile: Marksman
SniperPockets.aced_description: Raise your Marksman ammo bonus to {AcedIncreasedInventoryAmmo}.

AmmoUpI.name: Ammo Up I
AmmoUpI.base_description: Ammo Bags come with {AdditionalCharges} additional charge.

ArmoredUpI.name: Armored Up I
ArmoredUpI.base_description: Armor Bags come with {AdditionalCharges} additional charge.

ARPockets.name: Stockpile: Assault
ARPockets.base_description: Carry {IncreasedInventoryAmmo} more Assault Rifle and LMG reserve ammo.
ARPockets.aced_description: Raise your Assault Rifle and LMG ammo bonus to {AcedIncreasedInventoryAmmo}.

ExtraFrags.name: Stockpile: Frag Grenades
ExtraFrags.base_description: If your starting loadout contains Frag Grenades, receive {ExtraCount} additional Frag Grenade.

ConstantFlow.name: Flow State
ConstantFlow.base_description: Taking non-environmental damage increases your Dodge chance by {IncreasedDodge} until you perform a successful Dodge.
ConstantFlow.aced_description: Raise your Dodge bonus from damaged suffered to {AcedIncreasedDodge}.

SMGPockets.name: Stockpile: SMG
SMGPockets.aced_description: Raise your SMG ammo bonus to {AcedIncreasedInventoryAmmo}.

ExtraSmokes.name: Stockpile: Smoke Grenades
ExtraSmokes.base_description: If your starting loadout contains Smoke Grenades, receive {ExtraCount} additional Smoke Grenade.

QuickFixer.name: Repair Job
QuickFixer.base_description: Perform a quick melee on your Sentry Turret to reduce its heat buildup by {ReduceHeat}.
QuickFixer.aced_description:
Your quick melee now reduces the Sentry Turret's heat buildup by {AcedReduceHeat}.

Zap your turret with a Shock Grenade to cool it down completely.

ShotgunPockets.name: Stockpile: Shotgun
ShotgunPockets.aced_description: Raise your Shotgun ammo bonus to {AcedIncreasedInventoryAmmo}.

ElectricCapacity.name: Stockpile: Shock Grenades
ElectricCapacity.base_description: If your starting loadout contains Shock Grenades, receive {ExtraCount} additional Shock Grenade.

ECMExpert.name: Pump the Jam
ECMExpert.base_description: Active ECM Jammers mark cameras, FBI vans, and all special-type enemies for your crew.
ECMExpert.aced_description: If your starting loadout contains ECM Jammers, receive {AcedExtraCount} additional ECM Jammer.

PistolPockets.name: Stockpile: Handgun
PistolPockets.aced_description: Raise your Handgun ammo bonus to {AcedIncreasedInventoryAmmo}.

ExtraFlashbangs.name: Stockpile: Flashbang Grenades
ExtraFlashbangs.base_description: If your starting loadout contains Flashbang Grenades, receive {ExtraCount} additional Flashbang Grenade.

WalkingTall.name: Plain Sight
WalkingTall.base_description: Cameras detect you {DecreasedDetectionSpeed} slower in Private areas while unmasked.
WalkingTall.aced_description: Employees detect you {AcedDecreasedDetectionSpeed} slower in Secure areas while unmasked.

DoctoredUpII.name: Field Medic II
DoctoredUpII.base_description: Your Medic Bag comes with {AdditionalCharges} additional charge.
DoctoredUpII.aced_description: If your starting loadout contains a Medic Bag, receive {AcedExtraCount} additional Medic Bag.

DeepWounds.name: Deep Wounds
DeepWounds.aced_description: Increase your Throwing Knife damage bonus to {AcedIncreasedDamage}.

MoreSnacks.name: Consumerism
MoreSnacks.aced_description: Raise your consumable capacity bonus to {AcedExtraCount}.

HeadshotExpert.name: Skull Trauma
HeadshotExpert.base_description: Headshots with Marksman rifles deal {IncreasedDamage} more damage.
HeadshotExpert.aced_description: Increase the reload speed of Marksman rifles by {AcedIncreasedReloadSpeed}.

AmmoUpII.name: Ammo Up II
AmmoUpII.base_description: Ammo Bags come with {AdditionalCharges} additional charge.
AmmoUpII.aced_description: If your starting loadout contains an Ammo Bag, receive {AcedExtraCount} additional Ammo Bag.

BeastOfBurdon.name: Beast Of Burden
BeastOfBurdon.base_description: You can carry [sk-val]2[/] bags at once. This will incur a movement penalty.
BeastOfBurdon.aced_description:
You no longer suffer a movement penalty while carrying [sk-val]2[/] bags.

This will not negate movement penalties from heavy bags.

CrackOpen.name: Breaking Point
CrackOpen.base_description:
Armor Penetration for Assault Rifles and LMGs increases by {IncreasedArmorPenetration} for each hit that does not penetrate an enemy's armor.

This bonus stacks infinitely and ends once an enemy is killed.
CrackOpen.aced_description: This Armor Penetration bonus increases to {AcedIncreasedArmorPenetration}.

Scrounger.name: Scavenger
Scrounger.base_description:
Ammo pickups offer a {PickupChance} chance to restore <Skill>1</> throwable.

Throwables can only be restored up to your maximum carrying capacity, which you may increase through other skills.
Scrounger.aced_description: The chance to restore a throwable from an ammo pickup raises to {AcedPickupChance}.

LockMaster.name: Locksmith
LockMaster.base_description: It only takes <Skill>1</> lockpick jiggle to successfully pick a lock.
LockMaster.aced_description:
Perform a quick melee to unlock doors and lockers.

This ability only works on locks that can be picked. If you melee a breachable door, it will unlock instead of breaking.

BrickBuster.name: Cracked
BrickBuster.base_description: When you break an enemy's armor layer with an SMG, that enemy suffers {IncreasedDamage} additional damage from all sources.
BrickBuster.aced_description: The extra damage enemies suffer when you break their armor with an SMG raises to {AcedIncreasedDamage}.

PoisonCloud.name: Poisonous Gas
PoisonCloud.base_description:
Enemies suffer {DecreasedHealth} points of health damage per second while standing in your Smoke Grenade cloud.

This does not affect Dozers and Naders.
PoisonCloud.aced_description: The damage from your smoke clouds increases to {AcedDecreasedHealth} health points per second.

ShieldedTurret.name: Shields Up
ShieldedTurret.base_description: Sentry Turrets suffer {DecreasedIncomingHeatBuildup} less heat buildup from enemy attacks and interference.
ShieldedTurret.aced_description: The reduction to your Sentry Turret's heat buildup increases to {AcedDecreasedIncomingHeatBuildup}.

ShotgunSpeedloader.name: Speedloader
ShotgunSpeedloader.base_description: For each Shotgun pellet that hits an enemy, your next Shotgun reload is {IncreasedReloadSpeed} faster, up to a maximum of {MaxReloadSpeed}.
ShotgunSpeedloader.aced_description: Increase your reload bonus from Shotgun hits to {AcedIncreasedReloadSpeed}.

ElectricTenderizer.name: Electric Tenderizer
ElectricTenderizer.base_description: For each time a Shock Grenade blast hits the same enemy, that enemy will take {IncreasedIncomingDamage} additional damage from all sources.
ElectricTenderizer.aced_description: The damage bonus Shock Grenades inflict on enemies increases to {AcedIncreasedIncomingDamage}.

RadioExpert.name: Radio Star
RadioExpert.base_description:
Hack a guards radio to cause a distraction. The distracted guard will pause any action for {GuardDistractTime} seconds.

When the disturbance passes, the guard will return to their normal routine. You must keep a line of sight on the guard to hack their radio. This ability has a cooldown of {Cooldown} seconds.
RadioExpert.aced_description:
Radio hacks now distract a guard for {AcedGuardDistractTime} seconds.

The cooldown reduces to {AcedCooldown} seconds.

PistolRecon.name: Spatial Awareness
PistolRecon.base_description: Killing a marked enemy with a Handgun will ping the nearest unmarked target within {WithinRange} meters.
PistolRecon.aced_description:
If you have one armor plate or less, killing a marked enemy with a Handgun will heal you for {AcedMinHealthToRestore} points, or {AcedMaxHealthToRestore} points if you are below {AcedMaxAllowedHealthToHealExtra} of your maximum health.

If you are already at max health, you will receive Adrenaline.

FlashbangExposer.name: Spotlight
FlashbangExposer.base_description: Enemies caught by your Flashbang Grenades are marked for the entire crew.
FlashbangExposer.aced_description: If you kill a marked enemy while they are stunned by your Flashbang Grenade, they will drop an additional ammo box.

StrongArm.name: Strong-Armed
StrongArm.base_description:
You can use throwables while unmasked.

This is considered an illegal action.
StrongArm.aced_description: Reduce the movement penalty from carrying heavy bags and items.

Painmonger.name: Pain Tolerance
Painmonger.base_description: Any damage inflicted on your Adrenaline is reduced by {DecreasedIncomingOverHeal}.
Painmonger.aced_description: While at full health, you gain {AcedAdditionalOverHeal} Adrenaline when you steal loose cash, perform a takedown, kill an enemy with a Throwing Knife, revive a crewmate, or when a crewmate uses your Medic Bag.

HomemadeShiv.name: Prison Shiv
HomemadeShiv.base_description: Every {PickupCount} ammo boxes you pick up will restore <Skill>1</> Throwing Knife, but you can no longer get knives from Ammo Bags.
HomemadeShiv.aced_description: It only takes {AcedPickupCount} ammo boxes to build a Throwing Knife.

HumanResources.name: Human Resources
HumanResources.base_description: Your throwables do not affect hostages.
HumanResources.aced_description: Your throwables do not affect any civilians.

PiercingAmmo.name: Armor-Piercing
PiercingAmmo.base_description: If you land a headshot with a Marksman rifle that breaks an enemy's armor layer, it will remove <Skill>1</> additional layer.
PiercingAmmo.aced_description: While aiming down sights with a Marksman rifle, your shots will penetrate through <Skill>1</> additional target.

GrenadeBelt.name: Utility Belt
GrenadeBelt.base_description: Increase the total number of throwables you can carry by {ExtraCount}.
GrenadeBelt.aced_description: The number of extra throwables you can carry raises to {AcedExtraCount}.

ArmoredUpII.name: Armored Up II
ArmoredUpII.base_description: If your starting loadout contains an Armor Bag, receive {ExtraCount} additional Armor Bag.
ArmoredUpII.aced_description: Deploying an Armor Bag fully restores armor for any heister within {AcedWithinRange} meters.

HollowPointRounds.name: Hollow-Point Rounds
HollowPointRounds.base_description: Assault Rifles and LMGs deal {IncreasedHealthDamage} more health damage.
HollowPointRounds.aced_description: Raise your health damage bonus from Assault Rifles and LMGs to {AcedIncreasedHealthDamage}.

ImpactGrenades.name: Sudden Impact
ImpactGrenades.base_description: Frag Grenades now explode on impact.
ImpactGrenades.aced_description: If a Frag Grenade explodes by colliding with an enemy, it deals an additional {AcedIncreasedDamage} damage.

RiskTaker.name: Under Pressure
RiskTaker.base_description: Successfully dodging any damage restores {AddedHealth} points of health.
RiskTaker.aced_description: When health is at maximum, these points are converted to Adrenaline.

EvenAim.name: Steady Hands
EvenAim.base_description:
When you use an SMG to kill an enemy within {BuffDistance} meters, gain a buff that increases your SMG's hip fire accuracy. For kills further than {BuffDistance} meters, gain a buff that increases ADS accuracy with SMGs. 

Each buff lasts {BuffDuration} seconds.
EvenAim.aced_description:
Killing an enemy with an SMG increases both hipfire and ADS accuracy, regardless of distance. 

The duration of these buffs increases to {AcedBuffDuration} seconds.

ThickSmoke.name: Smokescreen
ThickSmoke.base_description:
If you have any chance to Dodge, it doubles while you are standing in a Smoke Grenade's cloud.

If you have no chance to Dodge, you instead gain {IncreasedDodge} Dodge.
ThickSmoke.aced_description:
Your Smoke Grenade clouds apply this Dodge bonus to all crew members.

Multiple instances of this skill do not stack.

ExtraTurrets.name: Sentry Squad
ExtraTurrets.base_description: You can now deploy an additional Sentry Turret.
ExtraTurrets.aced_description: You can deploy <Skill>2</> additional Sentry Turrets, but all turrets build up {AcedIncreasedHeatBuildup} more heat.

ShotgunObliterator.name: Annihilation
ShotgunObliterator.base_description: Shotguns deal {IncreasedDamage} more damage for each pellet that hits the same target.
ShotgunObliterator.aced_description: Increase your Shotgun's damage bonus from repeated hits to {AcedIncreasedDamage}.

PowerShockGrenades.name: Renewable Energy
PowerShockGrenades.base_description: Shock Grenades now detonate {AdditionalExplosion} additional {AdditionalExplosion}|plural(one=time,other=times) before expiring.
PowerShockGrenades.aced_description: Destroying a Zapper's battery or landmine restores <Skill>1</> Shock Grenade.

DefensiveMeasuress.name: High Marks
DefensiveMeasuress.base_description: Take {DamageReduction} less damage for each marked enemy within {WithinRange} meters, up to a cap of {MaxDamageReduction}.
DefensiveMeasuress.aced_description:
Your damage reduction from marked enemies now extends to your entire crew.

Multiple instances of this skill do not stack.

PistolExploiter.name: Cheap Trick
PistolExploiter.base_description: While you are holding a human shield and wielding a Handgun, take {DamageReduction} less damage.
PistolExploiter.aced_description: Shooting stunned enemies with a Handgun deals double damage.

EMPFlashbang.name: Hypersensitive
EMPFlashbang.base_description: If your Flashbang Grenade hits an enemy before colliding with an object or surface, it will detonate on impact.
EMPFlashbang.aced_description: If your Flashbang Grenade detonates on impact with an enemy, the Flashbang's stun duration will last twice as long.

Clipboard.name: Hall Pass
Clipboard.base_description: While you are unmasked, cameras will not detect you performing illegal actions.
Clipboard.aced_description: Employees will not detect you performing illegal actions while you are unmasked.

MeatBag.name: Scar Tissue
MeatBag.base_description: Your maximum health increases by {AddedHealth} for each down you still have left.
MeatBag.aced_description: Increase your maximum health bonus for each down to {AcedAddedHealth}.

FanThrow.name: Fan Throw
FanThrow.base_description:
Hurl {KnifeCount} Throwing Knives at once in a deadly arc.

This maneuver costs {KnifeConsumeCount} Throwing Knives.
FanThrow.aced_description: The number of Throwing Knives you can toss at once increases to {AcedKnifeCount}. This will only cost {AcedKnifeConsumeCount} knives.

Intimidator.name: Scare Tactics
Intimidator.base_description:
Shout at nearby guards, SWAT or Heavy SWAT and force them to surrender. 

Dealing damage or looking away from the target will cancel their surrender. Once taken hostage, the SWAT obeys all civilian rules. You cannot have more than <Skill>1</> SWAT hostage at a time.
Intimidator.aced_description: You can now command up to {AcedMaxHostages} SWAT hostages at a time.

SniperFunnel.name: Return Policy
SniperFunnel.base_description:
When you land a headshot with a Marksman rifle, <Skill>1</> bullet will return to your magazine.

This ability has a {Cooldown} second cooldown.
SniperFunnel.aced_description: The cooldown for regaining a bullet reduces to {AcedCooldown} seconds.

HighGrainAmmo.name: Bullet Frenzy
HighGrainAmmo.base_description: Once a heister interacts with your Ammo Bag, they deal {IncreasedDamage} more damage with the next magazine of their primary and secondary weapons, as well as their next throwable.
HighGrainAmmo.aced_description: Raise the damage bonus from your Ammo Bags to {AcedIncreasedDamage}.

Bastion.name: Bastion
Bastion.base_description:
Automatically deflect the Dozer's melee and Bull Rush attacks.

You also face no movement penalty from the Nader's gas cloud.
Bastion.aced_description:
Disengage from Zapper and Cloaker stun attacks.

This ability has a {AcedCooldown} second cooldown.

AmmoFunnel.name: Ammo Funnel
AmmoFunnel.base_description: If you kill an enemy that still has armor intact with an Assault Rifle or LMG, you will automatically receive their ammo drop.
AmmoFunnel.aced_description: Ammo gained from this skill goes directly into your Assault Rifle or LMG's magazine.

FragMaster.name: Mad Bomber
FragMaster.base_description: When your Frag Grenade explodes, it grants a {RestoreChance} chance to restore <Skill>1</> Frag Grenade.
FragMaster.aced_description:
After exploding, your Frag Grenade will break into {AcedExtraCount} smaller {AcedExtraCount}|plural(one=grenade,other=grenades) that each deal {AcedDecreasedDamage} of the original grenade's damage.

Smaller grenades have a {AcedRestoreChance} chance to restore <Skill>1</> Frag Grenade.

OnTheRun.name: On the Run
OnTheRun.base_description: While sprinting or sliding, and for {IncreasedDodgeDuration} seconds afterward, your Dodge chance increases by {IncreasedDodge}.
OnTheRun.aced_description: Shoot and reload SMGs while sprinting or sliding.

SMGMaster.name: SMGenius
SMGMaster.base_description:
When you reload an empty magazine from your SMG, increase damage with SMGs by {IncreasedDamage}. 

This buff can stack up to {BuffStack} times. Once the buff reaches its maximum stacks, it will expire after <Skill>10</> seconds.
SMGMaster.aced_description:
The duration of this SMG damage bonus refreshes whenever you break an enemy's armor layer.

The buff now stacks up to {AcedBuffStack} times.

SmokeMaster.name: Escape Artist
SmokeMaster.base_description:
If you become downed with any Smoke Grenades in your possession, deploy one instead to gain a fixed {DodgeChance} chance to Dodge for {ImmuneDuration} seconds. 

This ability refreshes after {SkillCooldown} seconds, and costs <Skill>1</> down. No other modifiers affect this Dodge chance. It does not apply to fall damage or Zapper stuns.
SmokeMaster.aced_description: While this ability is active, any headshot damage you inflict while standing in a Smoke Grenade's cloud increases by {AcedIncreasedDamage}.

LevelUp.name: Machine War
LevelUp.base_description:
When a Sentry Turret kills an enemy, its damage increases by {IncreasedDamage}.

This bonus ends if your turret overheats or is removed from the field.
LevelUp.aced_description:
The Sentry Turret's damage bonus increases to {AcedIncreasedDamage} and applies to all other turrets in your network.

This group bonus no longer ends if you pick up a turret, and any case of overheating only reduces the bonus by {AcedDecreasedOutgoingDamage}.

ShotgunTank.name: Berserker
ShotgunTank.base_description: While reloading a Shotgun, and for {DecreasedDamageDuration} second afterward, you take {DecreasedDamage} less damage from enemies within {WithinRange} meters.
ShotgunTank.aced_description:
Reload and fire Shotguns while sprinting.
You now take {AcedDecreasedDamage} less damage for {AcedDecreasedDamageDuration} seconds after reloading a Shotgun.

ArmorConductor.name: Highly Conductive
ArmorConductor.base_description:
Each time a Shock Grenade blast hits an enemy, they lose <Skill>1</> layer of armor for as long as they are stunned.

The enemy regains these layers once the stun wears off.
ArmorConductor.aced_description:
Enemies killed while affected by your Shock Grenade will emit an electric blast.

This new blast benefits from all other Electrician skills, but only enemies impacted from an actual Shock Grenade will emit additional blasts.

ElectricInterference.name: Electrical Interference
ElectricInterference.base_description: While your ECM Jammer is active, enemies become stunned for {StunnedDuration} seconds after anyone in your crew shoots them.
ElectricInterference.aced_description: When you destroy a Zappers battery, regain [sk-val]1[/] ECM Jammer.

BountyHunter.name: Bounty Hunter
BountyHunter.base_description:
Whenever you kill these marked special enemies with a Handgun, receive a bounty.
<Hostile>Zappers</> restore <Skill>1</> tool.
<Hostile>Naders</> restore <Skill>1</> throwable.
<Hostile>Techies</> restore <Skill>1</> broken armor layer.
BountyHunter.aced_description:
Add these marked special enemies to your bounty list.
Cloaker: Heal for {AcedAddedHealth} of your maximum health.
Dozer: Restore <Skill>1</> down.

FlashbangMaster.name: Sunburn
FlashbangMaster.aced_description:
Enemies affected by your Flashbang Grenades will lose half their armor layers.

This effect can only happen once per enemy.

HulkOut.name: Seeing Red
HulkOut.base_description: While you have Adrenaline, gain a {IncreasedDamage} damage bonus for every skill equipped in the Imposter branch.
HulkOut.aced_description: Your Adrenaline damage bonus increases to {AcedIncreasedDamage}.

FieldTriage.name: Health Guru
FieldTriage.base_description: Your Medic Bags now heal {HealPercentage} of a heister's maximum health.
FieldTriage.aced_description:
Whenever you deploy a Medic Bag, you and all crewmates within {AcedWithinRange} meters of the bag return to full health.

This effect will revive any downed heisters within range.

PunchingKnife.name: Hidden Blade
PunchingKnife.base_description:
If you have at least <Skill>1</> Throwing Knife, performing a quick melee on any enemy will spend the knife to instantly kill your target. 

This does not apply to Dozers. Throwing Knives used this way cannot be retrieved.
PunchingKnife.aced_description: If you are out of Throwing Knives, you may still quick-kill enemies after a {AcedSkillCooldown} second cooldown.

InsurancePlan.name: Insurance Plan
InsurancePlan.base_description:
Your crew gains a {DamageReduction} damage reduction for every tied hostage within {WithinRange} meters, capping at {MaxDamageReduction}.

Multiple instances of this skill will not stack.
InsurancePlan.aced_description: Your damage reduction from tied hostages increases to {AcedDamageReduction}. The cap raises to {AcedMaxDamageReduction}.

Graze.name: Ricochet
Graze.base_description:
When you land a headshot with a Marksman rifle, all enemies within {WithinRange} meter of the target take {AdditionalDamage} of the original shot's damage.

This effect will not penetrate armor.
Graze.aced_description: Enemies within range of the ricochet now take {AcedAdditionalDamage} of the original shot's damage.

HighQualityBag.name: Premium Bag
HighQualityBag.base_description: When you deploy an Ammo Bag, all heisters within {WithinRange} meters regain {ExtraCount} throwables.
HighQualityBag.aced_description: Once a heister interacts with your Ammo Bag, they gain {AcedIncreasedArmorPenetration} Armor Penetration on the next magazine of their primary and secondary weapons.
